name: Dungeon of Three
description:
A small dungeon crawl for the 2nd Vaultacular Jam built in Gamemaker Studio 2 in under 9 hours!

WASD to move

1, 2, and 3 to switch between sword, shield, and magic wand. m1 to use magic with the wand equipped

Use the sword to attack, shield to block things, and the wand to confuse enemies
